results.title: Bwana Devil 3D glasses
results.brief_description: Cardboard and plastic 3D movie glasses that fold open for wearing. Side arms of glasses have red printing noting ‘Arch Ooler’s’, “BWANA DEVIL”, ‘in NATURAL VISION’, ‘3-D Viewer No.718’ and hand written in blue pen ‘Jan 23 1953’.
results.description: Cardboard and plastic 3D movie glasses that fold open for wearing. Side arms of glasses have red printing noting ‘Arch Ooler’s’, “BWANA DEVIL”, ‘in NATURAL VISION’, ‘3-D Viewer No.718’ and hand written in blue pen ‘Jan 23 1953’.
